overview:
89concepts is a young, enthusiastic brand management company with great passion for design. 89concepts specialises in the creation and development of company branding; covering all aspects of visual communication, whether through traditional methods or through digital media. Whilst the image conscious consumer will judge your business on first appearances, our approach is built upon perception and how consumers generally visualise your brand. Our aim is to let your brand do the talking; as great work speaks for itself! Since our launch in 2007 we have provided various design solutions for different companies on different scale and everything in between. We may be small but our dedication and commitment makes up for our overall size, and choosing 89concepts will benefit any business from our one on one customer service and middle of the night brainstorms; as we never seem to switch off!

Clients

Stuphs clothing Juicy Signature Sossick Owengee Koffi Deolagold Lollyjay events Lafup d’comedian Flex entertainments Yeankeys Neptunes magazine
